description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Bel Ombre, Mauritius. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Mauritius Outrigger Escape with Five Restaurants & Bars & Private Beachfront Overlooking the Indian Ocean
hotels.description: Escape to a place where the Indian Ocean laps pristine white sands and it’s just as easy to find an exciting adventure as it is a tranquil spot to unwind. Outrigger Mauritius Beach Resort invites guests to relax at the hands of the high-end service the brand is renowned for and be whisked away to a world of refined beachfront luxury that’s just as perfect for honeymooning couples as it is for families. Located on the island’s south coast, in the upscale beach village of Bel Ombre, the resort offers guests a tranquil stretch of private beachfront with powder-white sand and azure ocean, perfect for swimming. Make the most of watersports, five pools, exceptional dining options, and the fun-filled Coral Kids' Club. Those looking for R&R can head to Navasana Spa, where an invigorating hammam and soothing Mauritian massages await. Dine on delectable fresh seafood, take a swing at picturesque golf courses and make the most of the incredible nature on your doorstep with forest hiking, world-class diving and snorkelling.

hotels.title: Boutique Mauritius Eco-Friendly Suites & Villas on South Coast with Beachfront Pool & Butler Service
hotels.description: Dive into paradise at this eco-chic retreat, where island charm meets French luxury in a relaxed beachfront setting. Exclusive suites and villas, designed by renowned Thai architect Lek Bunnag and Japanese fashion designer Kenzo Takada, blend gracefully into the natural environment, creating patches of peace within paradise. Splash around in the pool shaped like a panga knife, unwind with a nourshing treatment at SO Spa, or savour culinary delights at the French-inspired Le Flamboyant or oceanfront La Plage. Perched on Mauritius' wild south coast, adventure awaits just outside your door. Explore Fréderica Nature Reserve, tackle hiking trails at Le Morne Brabant or discover La Vanille Mascarene Reserve. Relish every opportunity knowing that SO Sofitel Mauritius is doing what it can to protect the local environment, including installing a water chiller plant and LED lighting, managing plastic and food waste and supporting local artisans and suppliers.
